Text: Sure seems to be. No idea whether it can be used with a retail console, but there's plenty of interesting stuff in there.
This looks genuine, but I haven't tested it yet, just browsed the files.  Anyone tested it for real, maybe who knows how to xfer the files from PC to Wii?
What is this? something like a bootloader or a PAL to NTSC converter or otherwise?
Please seed! this is very important for me!
It appears to be lacking the C:\CW_RVL directory. Also, this will (probably) only work on NDEV consoles.. We'll probably have to settle with NGC coding for Wii until another devkit is available...
C:\CW_RVL is just the codewarrior working directory.
Just need the DarcD.exe U8 Extractor and compiler.
